snippet.title: Peppy's Adventure - Trailer Update - Release date
snippet.description:
Hi all, we are excited to announce that Peppy's Adventure will launch on September 20. It will initially be available on Steam for Windows, Mac and Linux.

We have redrawn all the art to make it more unique and more aligned with the feeling with wanted to give to the players. We hope you'll like it :)

Follow us on Twitter or join our Discord for more updates.
--
Peppy’s Adventure is a 1-screen, top-down, action-puzzle game controlled with directional inputs only. You control Peppy, a bun-shaped bunny, on his journey to rescue the village younglings from the clutches of the Hooded Fox. As you pursue his airship, you will have to solve your way through short challenging levels as fast as possible facing an army of reckless foxes.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588910/Peppys_Adventure

Visit our website: https://pepitestudios.com

Join our Discord: discord.gg/QGSxHsWt5e
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PeppysAdventure
Follow us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/PeppysAdventure
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/peppysadventure

00:00 Intro
00:31 Gameplay
